titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ 8 Februarii 1646 Whereas the Lords in Parliament assembled, did upon the first of this instant February order, that a declaration should be printed and published, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
An order of the Lords desiring obedience to an ordinance of 6 February respecting the appointment of commissioners for compounding with delinquents.
Order to print signed: Joh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the Old Bayley
